snippet: Net income for the fiscal fourth quarter increased by 12 percent, but a smaller slate of movies at its Paramount Pictures studio contributed to lower revenue in that division.
abstract: Net income for the fiscal fourth quarter increased by 12 percent, but a smaller slate of movies at its Paramount Pictures studio contributed to lower revenue in that division.

headline.main: Viacom Profit Increases, but Movie Division Hurts Revenues
headline.print_headline: Revenue Falls at Viacom, Though Profits Are Up
